PRIVACY_POLICY.TITLE: Privacy Policy - RQM
PRIVACY_POLICY.INTRO_TITLE: We are RQM for Information and Communication Technology
PRIVACY_POLICY.INTRO_TEXT: A limited liability company with Commercial Registration No. 1010803732. Our services target government entities, semi-government entities, companies, and service providers for the government and private sectors. We provide services including but not limited to: software services, building integrated digital solutions, and cybersecurity services.
PRIVACY_POLICY.LAST_UPDATE_DATE: The privacy policy was last updated on [2/02/2025].

INTRODUCTION.TITLE: Introduction
INTRODUCTION.TEXT: We place great importance on your privacy and strive to ensure the protection of your personal data with the highest security standards. This privacy policy aims to clarify how your data is collected, used, and processed in a manner that preserves your rights and respects your privacy. Our commitment is based on transparency and trust to ensure a safe and comfortable experience for all users. Your trust is our focus, and we are committed to protecting your privacy by all possible means.

DATA_PROTECTION.TITLE: Personal Data Protection (The Pillar of Trust in the Digital World)
DATA_PROTECTION.TEXT_1: It is the system concerned with protecting individuals' personal data, ensuring their rights, and defining the obligations of controllers to ensure the application of its provisions.
DATA_PROTECTION.TEXT_2: In light of digital expansion, protecting personal data has become a necessity to enhance trust between individuals and institutions. Policies and agreements aim to regulate the collection and use of data while ensuring individuals' privacy and rights, achieving a balance between innovation and respect for privacy.

LEGAL_BASIS.TITLE: Legal Basis for Collecting Personal Data
LEGAL_BASIS.SUBTITLE: The legal basis we rely on at RQM to collect and process your personal data is:

LIST.CONSENT: Consent: Obtaining your explicit consent, including your consent to this policy, to process your personal data for the purposes referred to in this policy, such as: consenting to receive marketing information, sales offers, participating in surveys or research studies, or applying for jobs. You may withdraw your consent at any time, unless there is another legal basis that allows us to continue processing your data.
LIST.CONTRACTUAL: Contractual: We may process your personal data to fulfill our contractual obligations to you, including using your data to execute the contract concluded between us and provide the agreed services.
LIST.LEGITIMATE_INTEREST: Legitimate Interest: We may process your personal data to achieve our legitimate interests in various fields, provided that such processing does not override your rights and freedoms, such as but not limited to: direct marketing of certain services, detecting fraud, protecting network and information security, and improving and developing services based on data analysis.
LIST.LEGAL_OBLIGATION: Legal Obligation: We may process your data to comply with legal and regulatory requirements.

DATA_COLLECTION.TITLE: How is your personal data collected and what is the purpose of collecting it?
DATA_COLLECTION.SUBTITLE: We may collect your personal data for several purposes aimed at improving the services provided by us, including but not limited to:

DIRECT.TITLE: Data collected directly:
DIRECT.METHOD: Collection Method: Entering data via the website upon registration, contacting us, or through direct communication.
PURPOSES_LIST: Communicating regarding support, updates, or marketing.
Issuing invoices and completing payment transactions.
Operating, providing, and improving customer services.
Complying with legal and regulatory requirements.

WHAT_DATA.TITLE: What personal data is collected?
WHAT_DATA.TEXT: We may collect and process the following personal data when using any of our services, including but not limited to:
LIST: Basic Data: Full name, ID number, or Commercial Registration.
Contact Data: Email, phone number, national address, direct chats, and any other correspondence.
Usage Data: Login information, interactions within the system including your IP address, device type, operating system, and browser type.
Financial Data: Payment and billing data (in case of payments and related transactions).

STORAGE.TITLE: How do we store and retain personal data?
STORAGE.LOCATION: Storage Location: Data is stored securely using cloud computing services approved by RQM within the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, which comply with the standards of the National Cybersecurity Authority and other relevant standards.
STORAGE.RETENTION: We retain your personal data as long as necessary to achieve the purposes set out in this policy, unless relevant regulations require or allow it to be retained for a longer period. When the purpose of collecting and processing it ends, we will take reasonable measures to erase it from our systems and external systems that process data on our behalf, or remove everything that leads to linking it to you, unless there is a legal justification requiring its retention for a longer period or if it is closely related to a case pending before a judicial authority.
STORAGE.NOTE: Please note that requesting the deletion or modification of your data may affect your use of some of the services provided by us or terminate them, and we may not be able to restore them after deletion.

PROTECTION.TITLE: How do we protect and disclose your personal data?
PROTECTION.SEC_1_TITLE: 1. Protection of your personal data and disclosure
PROTECTION.SEC_1_TEXT:
We confirm that the confidentiality and security of your personal data are priorities for RQM, and we take a set of measures to ensure the protection of your data from unauthorized access or disclosure, except in cases required by law or where disclosure is necessary to provide services, technical support, or for analytical purposes. We take a set of reasonable technical, organizational, and technical measures to protect your data, including encryption, two-factor authentication, and continuous security software updates. However, please note that there is no completely secure way to transmit or store data over the Internet.
We pledge not to disclose your personal data for commercial purposes or share it with any third party other than as stated in this policy, except in the cases provided for in Article Fifteen of the Personal Data Protection Law, and we may share your information with a third party in the following cases:
SEC_1_LIST: Sharing it with subsidiaries and companies within our group.
Sharing it with service providers who provide services on our behalf.
Sharing it with external partners and service providers who provide services to us.
Sharing it with banks, financial institutions, and payment technology and service providers.

Sharing it with another party in cases of corporate activities such as acquisition, merger, or restructuring (including during due diligence and negotiation); sale of most of our shares and/or assets; financial transactions related to the purchase, liquidation, or dissolution of our business in whole or in part; or any other major corporate changes, and sharing it in implementation of a legal obligation in accordance with the laws and regulations in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
PROTECTION.SEC_2_TITLE: 2. Transfer of data outside the Kingdom
PROTECTION.SEC_2_TEXT:
RQM may have operations, administrative structures, and technical systems outside the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, and accordingly, we may transfer your personal data outside the Kingdom for processing and storage purposes by a third party abroad and to support our efforts to provide services efficiently. We are committed to ensuring that personal data transferred to a third party is subject to the same level of protection provided by RQM, in accordance with the laws and regulations applicable in the Kingdom.
In the event of data transfer outside the Kingdom, we are keen to take all necessary measures to ensure the protection of your data, including concluding contractual agreements with the third party ensuring their commitment to protection and privacy standards similar to those we apply and in accordance with the Personal Data Protection Law.

RIGHTS.TITLE: Your rights regarding the processing of your personal data:
RIGHTS.TEXT: You can exercise the following rights under the Personal Data Protection Law:
LIST: Right to be Informed: You have the right to know how we collect your personal data, the legal basis for its collection and processing, how it is processed, stored, destroyed, and to whom it will be disclosed. You can view all details through this policy or contact us through official communication channels.

Right to Access: You have the right to access your personal data stored with us when you log in to your account in any of our services, or by contacting us. Access shall be limited to your personal data only, without prejudice to the data of others, in accordance with the controls and procedures specified in the relevant law and regulations.

Right to Request Personal Data: You have the right to request a copy of your personal data in a readable and clear format whenever technically possible, by contacting us via official communication channels.
Right to Correction: You have the right to request correction, completion, or update of your personal data through any of our services or by contacting us via official communication channels.

Right to Destruction: You have the right to request the destruction of your personal data when there is no future need for it, unless there are legal justifications requiring or allowing its retention for a longer period.
Right to Withdraw Consent: You have the right to withdraw your consent to the processing of your data at any time unless there are legal justifications requiring otherwise.
RIGHTS.NOTE: When exercising one or more of the rights mentioned above or provided for in the Personal Data Protection Law, we are committed to implementing your requests within a period not exceeding thirty (30) days from the date of submitting the request. In the event that execution requires unexpected or unusual additional effort, we reserve the right to extend this period provided that the extension does not exceed an additional thirty (30) days, noting that some or all of these rights may be covered by specific exceptions and exemptions provided for in relevant regulations, and each request will be evaluated separately.

COMPLAINTS.TITLE: How to file a complaint or objection?
COMPLAINTS.SEC_1_TEXT: We reserve the right to update this policy from time to time. When we make material changes to the policy, we will update the policy on our website, and we may notify you through appropriate means of communication such as sending the policy via email. We urge you to review the privacy policy periodically on our website to stay informed of updates and how to protect your personal data. Your continued use of any of the services provided by us after posting any changes to this policy means your acceptance of those changes, and the date of the last update of this policy will be clarified at the top of the page.
COMPLAINTS.SEC_2_TEXT: This policy has been prepared in both Arabic and English. The English version is a translation of the Arabic version, and in case of conflict between the two versions, the Arabic version is the approved one.
COMPLAINTS.SEC_3_TEXT: If you have any questions, concerns, or complaints regarding this policy or your data that we hold, or if you wish to exercise any of your rights, we invite you to contact us through the Help Center (Contact Us) or via the communication channels below:

CONTACT_INFO.ADDRESS: Address: Riyadh - King Abdullah Road, Postal Code: 12481

COMPLAINTS.AUTHORITY_NOTE: If you are not satisfied with our handling of the complaint or if we do not respond within thirty days from the date of receiving your request, you can file a complaint with the competent authority:
COMPLAINTS.SDAIA: Saudi Data and Artificial Intelligence Authority (sdaia.gov.sa)

HERO.TITLE: Your Technology Story — Written in the Language of Execution
HERO.DESCRIPTION: At RQM, we don’t promise digital transformation. We open the gate to the digital future — and turn your story into secure, intelligent execution.

SECTION_1.TITLE: Why This Page?
SECTION_1.QUESTION_RIGHT: What story do we want to end successfully?
SECTION_1.TEXT: Technology doesn't fail, but the wrong story always fails.

SECTION_2.TITLE: You Are the Hero
SECTION_2.AS_A: Business Owner / Entity / Leadership Team looking to build an effective digital system
SECTION_2.I_WANT: A technical solution that understands my operational reality, respects security and compliance, and produces reliable data
SECTION_2.SO_THAT: I manage my business with confidence, make smart decisions, and build a sustainable digital future

STEP_1.TITLE: Discovery & Direction
STEP_1.DESC: We start from reality, not tools: We understand your goals, analyze operational challenges, read the regulatory environment, and determine the right digital direction.
STEP_1.NOTE: Where you should be digitally — not what to buy

STEP_2.TITLE: Enablement & Build
STEP_2.DESC: We turn vision into working architecture: Smart operation design, data readiness, built-in cybersecurity, and integration with your existing systems.

STEP_3.TITLE: Activation & Impact
STEP_3.DESC: We activate technology… and measure the result: Actual operation, faster decisions, higher security, and measurable impact.
STEP_3.NOTE: Value is not said — it is measured

SECTION_4.TITLE: Acceptance Criteria
CHECKLIST: Decision is based on correct information
Security is part of the design, not an afterthought
SECTION_4.RESULT: If all passed → Ready for scale

SECTION_5.TITLE: We Don’t Run From Complexity — We Design For It
SECTION_5.NOTE: The real system is tested here

SECTION_6.TITLE: Smart Decisions Start With Data
SECTION_6.DESC: We design our solutions so that: Data is clean, structures are clear, permissions are set, and analysis is possible at any time.
SECTION_6.NOTE: Without reliable data, there is no real intelligence

SECTION_7.TITLE: Transparency Is Not an Option — It’s Security
SECTION_7.DESC: Everything executed is: Recorded, Reviewed, and Traceable.
SECTION_7.NOTE: Because trust is built on clarity

SECTION_8.TITLE: This Is How Your Tech Story Ends
OUTCOMES: A partner who understands you before selling to you

FINAL.TEXT: At RQM, we don’t promise digital transformation, but we open the gate to the digital future, and write your technical story in the language of execution.
